job_description: We are seeking a highly motivated and analytical Data Scientist to join our growing team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for analyzing large datasets to extract actionable insights, build predictive models, and support data-driven decision-making. You will work closely with cross-functional teams including engineering, product, and business stakeholders.
required_skills: Python,R,SQL,Machine Learning,Deep Learning,Data Visualization,Statistics,Pandas,NumPy,Scikit-learn,TensorFlow,PyTorch,Big Data Technologies (Hadoop,Spark),Data Cleaning,Model Evaluation,A/B Testing,Data Wrangling,Git,Cloud Platforms (AWS,GCP,Azure),Tableau,Power BI,Communication Skills
required_education: Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science,Bachelor’s Degree in Data Science,Bachelor’s Degree in Statistics,Bachelor’s Degree in Mathematics,Bachelor’s Degree in Engineering,Master’s Degree in Data Science (optional but preferred),PhD in a relevant field (optional)
required_experience: 1+ years in Data Analysis,1+ years in Predictive Modeling,1+ years in Machine Learning,Experience with real-world datasets,Experience in deploying ML models,Experience in working with cross-functional teams,Internships or Projects involving data science
